publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2492 Christine Grahame: Quarriers’ National Epilepsy Assessment Centre—That the Parliament congratulates Quarriers’ National Epilepsy Assessment Centre on being the first independent hospital in Scotland to gain the European Foundation for Quality Management’s (EFQM) Committed to Excellence award; recognises that this is a unique facility in Scotland; notes the high quality service provided, in particular the range of activities undertaken with patients to evaluate their experience, and recommends the commendable business model applied at the centre to the wider health and social care community.
